author: dolander
msg: Add a single value default to the CheckBoxGroup.  If the defaultValue is now equal to
"checked" then all values will be checked (when the default value is used).  If the
defaultValue is equal to "unchecked" then all values will be unchecked.
In addition, I added a defaultValue to the CheckBoxOption.  This will override any

author: ekoneil
msg: Move the NetUI TLDs into the tag library JARs.

The html, template, and databinding tag libraries TLDs used to be included in WEB-INF/ for webapps.  This reduces the number of files needed by the webapp template by 3 and puts the TLDs into META-INF/ of the associated taglib JAR file.
and can be referenced in a JSP / .tag file as:
This change also removes these taglib references from all web.xml files.
If you are running an old application and need to upgrade, follow these steps:
1) delete the beehive-netui-*.tld files from your WEB-INF/ directory
2) remove the beehive-netui-*.tld entries from web.xml
3) update your NetUI runtime in WEB-INF/lib
2) switch to the taglib declarations above in any .jsp / .tag
